question: The Rasin Dam and Chillimal Dam are constructed in which Indian State?
explanation:
The State Government of Uttar Pradesh has constructed two dams in the state namely Rasin Dam and Chillimal Dam in Chitrakoot district.
These dams have been inaugurated recently by the Chief minister Yogi Adityanath. These water conserving structures are expected to bring relief to the existing water problems to the people of Chitrakoot district.
